sentences.sContent: His body was crushed and mangled beyond recognition.
sentences.sCn: 他的身体被轧得血肉模糊而无法辨认。

words.tran: 轧布者；绞肉机；乱砍者；压延机

trans.tranCn: 乱砍, 撕裂, 破坏, 毁损, 损坏, 轧布
trans.tranOther: If a physical object is mangled, it is crushed or twisted very forcefully, so that it is difficult to see what its original shape was
